website_summaries.verdict: Although it cleans well, quality is an issue for this mop. We recommend other models instead.
pros: We appreciate the powerful nozzle which effortlessly picks up dirt and grime

website_summaries.verdict: Top-selling spray mop comes with everything you need to get cleaning right away.
pros: Comes with mop pads, solution, batteries, and mop
Lock strip mop pads lock in moisture and germs for a more hygienic clean
Can be used on laminate, tile, or sealed hardwood
cons: The Swiffer pads are not reusable, leading to higher level of waste

customer_reviews.title: Had 2 BOTH broke! I use 2-3 times a week - HOW can this Co. be in business.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one May 2017 and had to buy another Jan 2018, the first one broke where the front sprayer nozzle (1) broke and the other sprayed only a couple inches. The 2nd one, the handle does NOT say put, it twists - even with the nylon notch in the hole it still rotates in my hands. AND, the sprayer STOP WORKING totally. The batteries cannot be bad that fast, but I but new ones in and still the motor does not work at all. This is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Seems better than before.
customer_reviews.text: Seems better than before. Ordered this one to replace my earlier model wet jet that broke below the handle. (After 3 or so years of weekly use). This upgrade seems like it's built a little better, but may still snapbwith stress below the handle. However, knowing it's weak spot now, I'll be sure to not put as much stress on that spot.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in October 2017, and used it maybe 4 times since then. I took it out yesterday, and it would not spray. I changed the batteries in case they were old, but it still didn't work. This is the second one I purchased in less than 2 years. Swiffer WetJet is useless. Now I have Spray solution and the mop refills that are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed Long Time Amazon Customer
customer_reviews.text: I was very upset when my Swiffer wet jet finally stopped working after 4 years. I ordered this and was so excited when it arrived but extremely disappointed when I opened the box to find the wires were cut in half!!!!! it came defective. I was able to get a refund but would have really liked a replacement which was not going to happen since they were out of stock. Very upset Amazon customer!!
customer_reviews.author: lese

customer_reviews.title: Came broken, but I normally love the Swiffer Wetjet
customer_reviews.text: I love the Swiffer Wetjet, but this one came defective. There are two sprayers at the base of the mop. One of them works perfectly and the other is broken. Instead of a nice even spray, it drips and makes a pool of cleaner on the floor. Not very effective, but I had already put it all together and used it before I knew it was broken. I really don't feel like disassembling and trying to fit it all back in a box. So I'll just deal with it and buy it from a walk-in store next time so I can return it more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Krysten Parry

customer_reviews.title: Works great, well built, but not rechargable and cannot use rechargable batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit. It seems well built, and works as expected. I just wish it was rechargable, or could even use rechargable batteries, which it states in the instructions to not use. Although it works for a long time with fresh batteries, one always has battery replacement, and creating more non-recyclable trash, as a constant issue. Great idea, but not implemented in the best possible way.
customer_reviews.author: Hermit58Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: THIS DOES NOT HAVE THE SCRUBBING PAD!
customer_reviews.text: Why is this different than the original? I am so frustrated; the scrubbing pad is half the product's utility. Why did they remove it??? Here's the original:
customer_reviews.author: Felix and Diana

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time I've bought a Swiffer Wet Jet and it has died after two months of occasional use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've bought a Swiffer Wet Jet and it has died after two months of occasional use. I of course tried putting in brand new batteries, cleaning everything, attaching a new bottle of solution and putting on a new pad, but nothing will revive it. I do like the product itself (that's why I was willing to give it a second chance) but to have it completely stop working again after such a short period of time suggests it's poorly made and not worth spending the money on.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Quickly Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We just moved to a place with laminate flooring and we purchased this. After using it once, we were surprised how much grime was on the floor (moving boxes, etc. had tracked a lot of dirt in the house) but it picked up a LOT of dirt and dust and it's easy to use. I've used this product in the past and it doesn't disappoint for an alternative to mopping with a traditional mop head and bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime A

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this. Fluid leaves ugly film on my dark wood floors, mop is heavy with jug of cleaning fluid attached. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't impressed with this product at all. It really didn't work that well for me. I still had to end up using my steam mop to get up stains. I used it and decided to go over the floor with the steam mop too and I couldn't believe the dirt that was left after using this product. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: KelleyH

customer_reviews.title: Scares our puppy, cleans our floors!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a puppy a few months back and have gotten tired of running through paper towels cleaning up her messes on our faux-hardwood floors (we're in an apartment). The Swiffer wet jet is perfect for those excited pee accidents, or when we spill something while baking in the kitchen that could be harmful to her. I recommend sweeping before Swiffer-ing, but the jets work really well and it's easy to clean most any mess. As well, my boyfriend was able to assemble this in less than 10 minutes (I'm unsure if he read the instructions) and even as an open-box product, everything was in order.
customer_reviews.author: Maree LaRue

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't get the handle into the body of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the handle into the body of the unit. Then I couldn't get the handle itself apart to pack it up for a return. Now I'm stuck with something that doesn't fit back into the box it came in, and I have no other box in which to return it! Out of the money and out of patience.
customer_reviews.author: Brette O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I ever bought. I hate it!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more dissatisfied with a product than I am with this one. I'd count this as the worst amazon purchase I have ever made. We have brand new floors and I will scrub and scrub on the slightest stain or dirt and it doesn't do a thing. A wet paper towel in one swipe will do more than this Swiffer and an hour of scrubbing. Not to mention you have to buy their "cleaner" which is just fragrant water and their pads. DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Item doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't work. I assembled it and put the batteries in (facing the correct way) but nothing comes out of the spray nozzles. I even tried using other batteries in case the ones in the package were just old but it still doesn't work. I tested all of the batteries on other items and they all work. The swiffer does not fit back into the box as is and I'm having a hard time disassembling it in order to return it. I typically order from Amazon for the convenience since I don't drive. I've never had an issue before. I'm not sure I'll be able to return this item now. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Erin j.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but Doesn’t clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a new house with dark hardwood floors. I got this to remove footprints on the wood floor. It sprays nicely and everything looks wet and clean then dries and the floor is still the same. I cleaned them using a towel no problem. The pads seem cheap and not very absorbing. They have a slight scratching sound like plastic on wood, and I’m not using the pads for tile. Those are even worse. Get a good old fashioned mop. This not a mop, rather, a motorized sprayer with a not so good cleaning capability, which matters most.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Bottle can not ne I screwed and refilled wasteful
customer_reviews.text: The bottle of cleaner. That came with it was very small. Fortunately I had purchased a two pack of replacements. The main problem I have is that it is enviormentally s disaster The plastic bottles are not refillable. So each one you use is discarded to go to a landfill. There is not a valid reason for this If you could refil
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Folston

customer_reviews.title: Swiffer Wetjet one tool you cannot live with out
customer_reviews.text: It was suggested I purchase this, because of course my floors needed to mopped. Honestly mopping WAS such a pain. You have to get out the bucket, the mop and the floor clearer and you have to move the furniture. BOY WHAT A PAIN. All of this changed the day I purchased this item. I even saw on YouTube how to refill the bottles with the product of your chose. There is no mess what so ever and I finally have fun cleaning. What more could you possibly need.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the second one of those. First time, it wouldn't spray anymore, and I thought I wasn't lucky and broke it. Bought a new one... lasted for a year with a few uses here and there... I probably use it once or twice a month. It broke again - it does a weird noise and the product won't come out anymore. It still in perfect condition on the exterior, so I'm not sure why they keep breaking on me, I didn't make it go through extreme conditions, so I'm probably gonna go back to the old mop!! I definitely don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Demons

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointed with P&G-Just Skip It!
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed with this purchase-I bought this kit January 24th. For a time, it worked great and made cleaning our floors very easy! However, less than four months later and with only normal use, the spray button has stopped working completely. I tried to troubleshoot this-replaced batteries several times, made sure bottle was full, check pads, etc-with no luck. I see the return window has ended, so there’s no way for me to get my money back and I’m stuck with a completely useless tool. In theory this product is super helpful, so i’m off to find a suitable product from a competitor. Just skip the wetjet-it’s expensive junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be refillable
customer_reviews.text: I make my own organic floor cleaner. It took over an hour to modify the cartridge so I could use my cleaner in it. I also do not understand making the cartridge disposable, even if using your chemicals, I should be able to buy a concentration and refill the cartridge. One pump squeaky floor shine crap, bottle of distilled water, done. Such a waste to throw out the cartridge instead of refilling it. Unless your new slogan is going to be "Swiffer! Clean floors, dirty planet"
customer_reviews.author: Louis Cyphre 1501

customer_reviews.title: Loved this the one whole year I got to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this the one whole year I got to use it. It has now stopped working completely. The motor has ceased to work after only a year of use probably 4 times. And yes, I did replace the batteries. When I contacted Swiffer, they were unable to offer me ANYTHING besides a $20 coupon to buy a whole new mop from them. I think from reading the reviews this is a common issue. I would definitely not recommend anyone from buying this product and would buy a different brand and spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for daily light cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mop for a house with four people, each of whom cook. The floor gets dirty frequently. It is a great mop for general cleaning. You will still need to do a deep clean with a heavy-duty mop. But for daily cleaning of linoleum and hardwood floors, this is an easy device to use and keeps it looking clean. Just be aware it's not a substitute for deep cleaning. Occasionally you'll need to use a heavy duty mop, which this isn't.
customer_reviews.author: W.T.M.

customer_reviews.title: i actually don't like this thing
customer_reviews.text: i actually don't like this thing. Its hard to turn in tight spaces, so i end up just pushing hair around and on my hands and knees picking it up with other towels. WHICH WAS THE POINT OF BUYING THIS. so overall, pointless. Get a regular swiffer and a vacuum and skip this pointless thing.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy their refill bottles of cleaning solution.
customer_reviews.text: I hate that you cannot just fill the cleaning dispenser with your own hard wood floor cleaner. They have made it impossible to take the cap off so that you have to buy a new bottle of their solution. Wish I had know that before I bought it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the cleaning solution is  dangerously slippery on our bamboo when wet
customer_reviews.text: be very carefull as cleaning agent is dangerously slippery when damp or wet i have already fallen once,i have tossed there cleaning danger in the trash and use only a mixture of 10% alcohol 10% vinegar 90% distilled water works perfect with pads and is not so dangerous to use,,, even after cleaning if moisture comes in contact with the floor it is ridiculously slippery
customer_reviews.author: LaronVonBaron

customer_reviews.title: The redesigned Swiffer doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Had a Swiffer Wetjet for many years until the handle broke. Liked it. Bought the replacement in October 2017 and right away noticed that the spray nozzles didn’t spray fluid in front, but rather to the sides, which made mopping much more difficult. Finally, after less than 2 years of use, I attempted to change the batteries and now it no longer sprays. I find myself up to my neck in pads and bottles of fluid and am forced to now buy another defective product. Why couldn’t Proctor leave well enough alone? The original Swiffers were great, and even had a little scuff pad attached. That’s gone, too.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: You must buy their refill solution
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and ease of use. What I don't like but was an excellent marketing choice for the designers was you have to use their refills. I can't use chemicals in my house so was planning to mix my own natural cleaner. But the reservoir design has a rubber diaphragm that two needles poke through and runs to the sprayers. You can't unscrew the cap and refill plus I think you would only be able to poke that diaphragm so many times befor it starts to leak. So now I have to walk around with a spray bottle of my own solution.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha N

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get my money back, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I thought it would be. So disappointing, after using it for only a second time this weekend the spray button got jammed now ofcz I’m unable to use it again. I wish my return window hadn’t closed already (i waited too long before i opened it to try) because i would honestly prefer my money back and go back to regular mops. This one is hard to turn too. Heavier than expected. Just not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this wet jet model for years. Usually a wet jet last close to a year before it breaks at the handle from daily use. The last 2 I order have been defective by leaking, or the handle coming undone while mopping. Maybe they had a bad batch come out of the factory, usually there quality control is better. They should reinforce the handle material so they last longer than longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Will rarely use it
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on Large clay kitchen floor tiles, medium ceramic bathroom tiles, and faux marble entryway tiles. It doesn't pick much up, mostly just smears even light dirt or hair around on the floor. Then I still have to get down and pick up the residual debris by hand with a damp rag, or go over everything again with a regular mop. It also would not scrub anything off that was stuck, not even minor dried spills, with the 'scrubbing strip' pads. My sister-in-law loves her Swiffer, but she has vinyl faux-wood linoleum type flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Health nuttybuddy

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July, now it's November that has stopped working, the bottle was full of liquid, but nothing coming out when I pressed the button, so I thought it needs to change the battery, but it's still not working, my husband decided to open up to take a look inside, to our surprise, it's all rusty in there that you can see in the pictures, unable to use anymore so I had to throw it away, such a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Nora N

customer_reviews.title: Will not assemble
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased Swiffer Wet Jet mops in the past. Somehow my housekeeper broke my most recent (the first is with my ex-wife). I have tried NUMEROUS times to assemble this one, but the handle will not go on. The previous mops went together with zero issues, so it has to be defective. I don't have the original packaging because it was damaged in shipping. I am writing this as a review in hopes that someone from Amazon will actually see this to help with this issue. HELP!!
customer_reviews.author: BenAdams75

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 5 uses :(
customer_reviews.text: Had this less than a year, still using the pads the box came with actually... And the spray function bas completely stopped working. I've tried new batteries, new solution, wiping the nozzles, every troubleshooting idea I could Google... Very disappointed that I got less than 5 uses out of this
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the performance of this mop, though the replacement fluids seem a bit pricey. However, the first one failed at about 3 months old. Since I liked it so much, I went ahead and bought a new one just to have it fail after two months. So I have now purchased a different mop product that I hope out lasts this Swiffer junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Swiffer WetJet makes cleaning Easier
customer_reviews.text: Once your floors have had a thorough cleaning, the Swiffer WetJet will maintain that level of cleanliness easy when used regularly. After a meal your kitchen floor only needs a quick wet mopping with the Swiffer WetJet to keep a fresh and clean appearance. I recommend it because it will make your cleaning a breeze, saving you time, while maintaining the highest level of cleanliness with the least amount of work for you. It has given me the gift of time, while maintaining a fresh clean floor after every use. I highly recommend getting a Swiffer WetJet, I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Steve from Tucson

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The bottle of cleaning solution is constantly falling out now matter how secure you put it in the mop. It is extremely frustrating. It literally constantly falls out onto the floor and I have to put it back in 3 times just for one room. Not happy with my purchase at all
customer_reviews.author: Erin M

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick cleanup
customer_reviews.text: The Swiffer Wetjet is my daily go to for cleaning my wood floors. I have a yellow lab that sheds a lot and the swiffer is amazing at catching all the dog hair. The cleaning solution smells great. The wetjet was easy to assemble. I don’t think this is a solution for deep cleaning however it is a great cleaning tool for quick cleanup. I love that I can buy refill pads and solution on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Great for small cleans up or a small wood floor home
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy! I was so excited to use this mop and it did not disappoint. The mop took about 5-7 minutes to put together and then it was READY! It is very easy to use and cleans fairly well. Some precautions are that you must sweep your house prior to use as it is only a mop! Also if you have dried spills that have been there for a while you may have to prescrub prior to using the mop. I enjoyed my first experience with it. I had to use 3 pads and about 1/2 of the included cleaning solution bottle to clean a very small kitchen, very small bathroom and one bedroom and a few hallway areas.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: When you have a small kitchen/small area that isn't carpeted, a Swifter is the best option! I love the Swifter! You just have to make sure when putting in cleaner, to click it in. Also, you need to put the batteries in first! I didn't really get instructions when this arrived. However, it was easy enough to figure out (and I'm sure there's a how-to video online)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is not what was advertised. The Swiffer that I received is the less expensive regular Swiffer instead of the Swiffer for hardwood floors that I assumed I ordered. I can't return it because it is not eligible for return. Very unhappy that I paid more for the regular Swiffer than what it normally costs.
customer_reviews.author: MommaT

customer_reviews.title: This wipes but doesn’t clean
customer_reviews.text: Why oh why do I keep giving in to the lure of the Swiffer? These do not clean your floors, especially your kitchen floors. They will wipe your floors and get some of the surface dirt off. However, sometimes you just have to get down on your hands and knees and scrub if you really want clean floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jukisoo

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE device- leaks EVERYWHERE and ruined my hardwood floors when ...
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE device- leaks EVERYWHERE and ruined my hardwood floors when I left it sitting (and it was in upward position)- The item leaks and warped my floors. I cannot return because I passed the "time window"- I WANT MY MONEY BACK. Terrible item !!!
customer_reviews.author: LeenyBeany

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mop for 3 months now, I used it about once a week or as needed to clean the floor after I wipe up all spill. It stopped working last week so I assumed it needed new batteries. I got some and put them in and it still didn’t work. My husband took the batteries out and put them back in, still didn’t work. After fooling with it for a few he decided to take it apart. After much prying and pulling he got it open and this is what we found. A completely rusted out moter. I loved this product while it worked but it only worked for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WET ON HARD WOOD/DON'T FORGET YOUR (DRY) PADS
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well enough in what is a relatively small home, but imagine that the combination of ware and tear, batteries, pads, and refills can become fairly costly for large family homes. All in all it does what it says. Very simple to put together; you can assemble in about a minute and get it working the floors. Excellent on hard wood although best results are to Swif with the wet feature, and follow up with a dry pad. Gets your floors nice and clean but the nature of the wet pad means that whilst it will clean the floor it may leave lumps of cack residue, which the dry pad will happily scoop up at the first attempt.
customer_reviews.author: MORGAN

customer_reviews.title: Worst swiffer yet.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate it. You can’t clean without using/buying their wet wipes. It’s not designed so you can use alternative cleaning products. You have to use/buy their cleaning agent AND their dry wipes. I’ve tried so many things, and end up breaking my back to keep paper towels underneath so I can use a more natural cleaning agent. I’m so over it. I’m donating it and wish I could get my money back. I’m investing in a wet and dry vacuum that actually picks up dog hair and allows for alternative cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hardwood floors and it works alright. It's really nice that it comes in a full pack so you can just order one thing and get a cleaning, although I wouldn't be opposed to it having more pads in it (even for a little extra coin). It works well for general cleaning, but you'll definitely need something more heavy duty for sticky spills that were left over night (parties and all). I'll still continue to use this for the daily wipe ups, but I'm going to keep my eyes out for something more heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this on July 24,2018 and it stop working. Change battery still did not work. This is the second one the first one we through away but this one i was determine to find out what happened and what i found was a rusty motor . I bet the one i through away had the same problem my wife is going back to a spaghetti mop and she says that works better. There is something in the manufacturer but we bought 2 and we are done.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for easy cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It makes mopping soo much easier. It doesn’t scrub well, but I’ve never had a mop that scrubs off the stuck on snacks and who knows what from my toddlers anyway! Still have to get down on hands and knees for that stuff. But for a quick mop it’s perfect! The bottle of cleaning liquid it comes with can be refilled! I just keep filling it with pinesol and water to save money & disinfect better because the cleaner it comes with is not disinfectant.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Works better than you'd think
customer_reviews.text: Works better than you'd think! My wife wanted this, and I was skeptical. We have tried our hand with a few other similar products that just end up pushing the dirt around the floor to make a nice, even, and consistent film of dirt everywhere. But for the price, and for her determination, I was willing to give it a try. It works really well! We have tile floors, and the mop really does a good job of picking up the dirt and not spreading it around. The spray function is great too and allows you to add whatever cleaner you'd like. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great advancement in easy floor cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Although I will probably replace the liquid with a very diluted murphy's oil or some other soap solution like another customer suggested re-using the same bottle but making a hole in the top and replacing the liquid thru that hole and plugging it up with a cork. The mechanics of the swiffer work very well. It is also very light-weight. The pads are effective at most dirt and stains. I see where you can substitute cheaper pads too. Will try that as well. I'm all about the best clean for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: mlenya

customer_reviews.title: You can’t beat a Swiffer
customer_reviews.text: Swiffer changed the way people clean their floors. I can’t even remember the last time I used a regular mop and broom to clean my floors. This particular model is slightly different from the original WetJet. The spray valves are positioned perfectly making the spray more precise and effective. My only problem is they make it hard for you to use your own cleaning solution... or just plain water. The bottles weren’t designed to be re-filled directly, so you either struggle to open them or buy new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Crescenzi

customer_reviews.title: Great for all types of floor and is very handy
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself a cleaning freak and as mother of a young toddler The cleaning is something I can’t compromise and this product is a game changer for me. I love it because it is easy to use, can be suitable for dry and wet pads so you have 2 in one. Also the jets help you a lot to remove stains (my dining room around the baby high chair is cleaner than ever) and you can be precise in the areas you want to give special attention. I’m very happy with it and recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rafa

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite What I Had Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: Okay, maybe I'm stupid, but I kind of expected the Swiffer to work as well as a regular mop. It doesn't. I still find myself just scrubbing the floors on my hands and knees. If you're looking for something to keep your floors clean, not necessarily clean dirty floors, this would be fine. The pads don't stick that well to the mop, but it isn't that big of a deal. The smell of the cleaner isn't overwhelming, either, which is always a plus when it comes to cleaning products!
customer_reviews.author: kkinney

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after a very short time
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mop for a couple of years and the handle broke so purchased a replacement...within a month it was not spraying properly so I purchased a new bottle of liquid cleaner (assuming it was a defective bottle) ,still not spraying so cleaned the whole flat part of the mop and jet holes ....still not working properly ....I'm now left with a defective mop and 2 full bottles of cleaner (useless because you cant use the liquid without the mop unless you cut a hole ) ...so all in all disappointed with this particular purchase and the short life span
customer_reviews.author: Zoe L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: My original 10 year old Swiffer WetJet mop finally needed replacing. I looked everywhere locally for a replacement with no luck. I was very pleased to see Amazon carry it. I cannot live without this - it is essential for my wood as well as tile floors. It works so well and is really easy to use. It goes under furniture and glides sling the moldings and quarter round. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: meli

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardware floors. Quick and easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my entire apartment besides the bedrooms is hardwood floors. I used to have the regular swiffer but the wet pads would dry up after like 5 feet of swiffering. This was the perfect machine to help clean the entire apartment. We even had a halloween party a couple nights before, and there was beer and a bunch of spilt juice and such on the floor. This cleaned up the mess in 5 minutes and left the floors like brand new. Not sticky at all after.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Coles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick spills and day to day cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Swiffer wet mop and love it so I bought this one for my 84 year old Mom. She is starting to have a hard time with conventional mops as they are hard to wring out and handle for her. She loves this because it is light and there is no wringing! I don't think I could recommend it for deep cleaning, but for every day it is perfect. The cleaning liquid has a nice smell and leaves for residue or streaks.
customer_reviews.author: DML 59

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easier, everyday kind of mop
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility and simple ness of this item. I can mop super quickly and it helps me tidy up fast. Especially with a baby that likes to crawl all over the floor. If I want to deep clean my floors, I have to use my steam mop. Even if you mop with the swiffer everyday, there’s still the need to deep clean your floors with something else. But again, is way easier to use the swiffer as a quick/ everyday clean. I’m not a fan of the lavender/vanilla scent - it smells warm and too overpowering “sweet”. I prefer the wood floors cleaning solution. It smells fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bedaws

customer_reviews.title: Easy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mop cuz I didn't want to use the traditional mop and bucket as it used to hurt my back. I didn't wanna deal with dipping the mop in the bucket water and squeezing it, especially in winter! This mop is lightweight and makes mopping easy. I'm deducting a star for 2 reasons: A. It takes 4 AA batteries just to spurt the cleaning solution. This could've been designed without the use of batteries! B. You can only use their cleaner solution for cleaning as they say other liquids may damage the mop. Should've been designed in such a way that it's compatible with all cleaners!
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Try it and You'll see why it's such a Helping Hand!!
customer_reviews.text: I had seen friends using the Swiffer WetJet and when I moved into a house with Wooden floors I immediately ordered this for the house and it's been a HUGE Help to me. It's even possible for me to use it from my Wheelchair and get it done quickly. It's SUPER RELIABLE AND I love how it gets up almost all of my spills in the kitchen, bedroom and bathroom. Getting the subscription to the refills is the way to go for me. I choose to clean daily and it's a real breeze to do it with the Swiffer WetJet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wil Engle

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully, and cleans like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over 2 years ago, and I still use it to this day!! I use it for my tile kitchen and hardwood floors, and it does a really good job at dispensing the cleaning agent and lifting dirt and grime from the floors. It's great on battery draining, as I've only had to replace the batteries once in these past two years. I would highly recommend as a mop and bucket alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Borsalino A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I purchased since 2014. My first one died after 3-year use. The sprayer doesn't work anymore. I am a heavy user, and use this mop every day. So, I think a 3-year mop life is acceptable for me. Then, I purchased the second one in the early of last year, and it works well until last month. One of the two sprayers is not working. I checked the outlet, and confirmed that it is not jammed. I think the motor inside might be out of work. So, I have to order the 3rd one last month, and hopefully this one can last longer this time.
customer_reviews.author: Fantastli

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick cleanup jobs
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can switch between wood and tile easily by changing the cleaning solution bottle. Also the pads are disposable no need to clean afterwards - use and through. I know that there exists ways to open the solution bottle to re-fill with any solution. I have tried that but want to use original swiffer solution for best results. I am buying pack of two from Home Depot / Lowes for $10. Cheaper pads are also available from online stores.
customer_reviews.author: Raghvendra Bali

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: In comparing the Wet Jet to our regular mop, this item came out lacking. It is nice on TV but in reality for hard cleaning, our old mop did the best job by far. Good thing I only bought this kit to test it out before investing in all the stuff that goes with it. Money could have been better used for more good old fashion mop heads. Advertising is great but it is made to sell the item. Not to give you the truth. Their duster is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Polite and Kind

customer_reviews.title: Left a sticky residue on my floor
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept, but the fluid left a sticky residue on my floors. I used a product for tile/vinyl floos and another product for hardwood floors--both left the residue which seemed to ATTRACT dirt. Plain water is better by far in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my wood vinyl floors
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my Swiffer!!! I'm planning on making my own reusable mop pads, however. They give you like 6 with this package (3 scrubbing, 3 regular) and I feel like it's a waste of materials. You have to change them after every 4-5 uses otherwise you're spreading dirt around everywhere (makes sense). I tried rinsing the pads, which worked for maybe one or two more uses, but it really sucks up dirt and doesn't let it go (good thing!!) until it's just too saturated. I'll also probably just refill the bottle with my own solution after the included stuff runs out--murphy oil FTW!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hallis

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Product.
customer_reviews.text: I will give this a five star because it is a great product. It cleans the floor really good. However, I give deep clean a 4 stars not that it does not clean well. It cleans fabulous. I just prefer a mop and bucket when it comes to getting a deep clean. The swiffer mop does a wonderful job for the in between deep cleanings. It is convenient for quick spills around the house. I have a six year old boy so my house has had its occasional spills. Overall, a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Nash

customer_reviews.title: Item broke after light use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Swiffer wetjet hardwood floor mop cleaner back in May, 2018. I have had this item for only 5 months, and it already broke! The button that dispenses the floor cleaner no longer works. I have replaced the batteries several times, took the machine apart, etc, however, it is not working. Previously I've had the same Swiffer and it lasted several years. I dont know about this one. I would recommend looking into buying another product to clean your floor, because this one is not lasting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jet swifter mop. The only negative is that it doesn't pick up hair & sometimes doesn't pick up on dirt either. It leaves the streak of dirt & I have to pick up the mop & place it directly on the dirt for it to pick it up. Otherwise it just pushes it away. The sheets only work for two uses only. The scent of the spray leaves a fresh scent behind. It's a workout using this as you have to push hard on it for it work on the floors. I wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Deppmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Great for polished concrete floors
customer_reviews.text: Works great on polished concrete and stamped concrete too! Between this and the Roomba vacuum cleaner, cleaning is a snap. Love the ease of the disposable pads. I use one pad every week to do a light cleaning of the entire kitchen floor and the floor always looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Curtis

customer_reviews.title: VERY CONVENIENT
customer_reviews.text: My first Swiffer Sweeper stopped working, so I had to buy another. It is so convenient. Keep it in the kitchen. When there is a stain on the floor, just pop a bottle of cleaner in the sweeper and clean it up. I also use it for my laminate floors. It cleans tile well, but it is not a deep clean. I don't think it clean the grout well. I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: leaves a residue on tile
customer_reviews.text: I've use this on my hardwood floors and love it especially how easy it is, but when i tried it on some tile flooring it seemed to want to leave some streaks on the tile which drove me nuts to look at but for everything else i love it!
customer_reviews.author: MaTT

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in early March just as a quick and easy way to wipe down the kitchen and bath oom floors. Worked fine for a few weeks. I used it for light mopping of two small areas about twice a week. Now it won't work at all. I tried replacing the batteries, but it still doesn't work.. Now I just tie a damp sock around it and use if with a spray bottle. Quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Have used this once but it was a struggle to get it to work and just now tried it again and changed out batteries once again and it just will not turn on to spray. Have an older Swiffer that you can hear the motor engage but does not spray and I am unable to get the sprayer mechanism unclogged. Switching out the battery packs the new one will work in older mop but no contact in the new mop. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life.
customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t I buy this sooner!?! If you look online you can figure out ways to refill the solution and make your own since it can be costly to use the swifter brand. I also got a reusable pad here on amazon to use sometimes instead of the disposable ones. I use to use a regular sponge mop on my tile floors but this is actually much more efficient and easier to use to get the dirt up. The floors also dry way faster this way than mopping and less streaks. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: kttiekat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and cheap are this products best qualities
customer_reviews.text: This product works so much better than the mop that we had. It works well on our 1200sq ft apt. I was nervous about the liquid spray because it ran out after using just a couple times cleaning the whole apt. That is the only downfall to this product. If you can find a way to cheaper the liquid spray, this would be a truly amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: cwlock002

customer_reviews.title: worked well while it worked
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this August 2019. I used it infrequently. A couple of times I had problems with it not working, got it going again. Now it's dead. I would guess I used it fewer than 20 times in small areas. I liked it when it worked, but not worth replacing for that price. Back to the mop and bucket.
customer_reviews.author: rider237

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but there are better alternatives
customer_reviews.text: I've used other brands in the past that had a more secure method of locking the pads to the mop, which I would prefer over the velcro style of this mop. Additionally, the included cleaning solution is a smaller size than expected. I would recommend looking for one with washable pads and fillable cleaning solution vessel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT IS USELESS AND A WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a piece of crap. i was able to use it for less than 5 minutes. cant take it apart either to put back in box to return . I WOULD NOT MAKE THIS PURCHASE ONLINE.
customer_reviews.author: kacey

customer_reviews.title: Efficient tool for cleaning floors
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the price on Amazon was comparable or better than the other stores I looked in. The WetJet itself works well. Assembly took maybe 5 minutes, the kit comes with plenty of cleaning solution for the floor and replacement pads, and the WetJet is very user friendly. I just sweep with a broom and then go over the floors with the WetJet, spraying as I go. There's a fine layer of the cleaning solution that stays on the floor, which has a pleasant smell and dries quickly. You'll be amazed at how much grime it picks up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I like this value pack comes with one jet dry fluid cleaner and dry and wet pads. Battery powered which came with it. Clean basic floor mess. The liquid doesn’t last to long but I can do a full house clean with it note I have no rugs in my 3 bedroom and 2 bath home. I wish fluid was refillable so if you don’t want to spend money each week go with a jet cleaner with refillable bottles there is no way to open and refill the bottle I tried .
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Burton

customer_reviews.title: "Mom I Friggin Love It....~
customer_reviews.text: I brought the Swifter Starter Kit for my daughter for her tile floors, she was having problems getting them to stay stain free they always look dirty even after she washed them with a regular mop.. So I got her the starter kit to see if it would help her, her text to me after trying it out was... Quote "Mom I Figgin Love It"... Guess she loves it... Lol....~
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the one for hardwood floors, because that's all that's in my home besides the bathing areas. And instead, I received the product for regular floors.
customer_reviews.author: why

customer_reviews.title: Buy a real mop
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money just get a real mop. This is good for those random spills and drips that occur during the day. Not to clean an entire floor. That bottle of cleaning solution is super small and doesn't last long. The spray jet sucks it doesn't spray more than 2 inches and if you don't put the swifter pad in a certain spot then the solution gets caught up in the pad. My husband kept asking for one so I got It thinking maybe he would be right about something this time but no ... ladies always go with your gut.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Get the mechanical version instead - cheaper and better
customer_reviews.text: We're not crazy about this product. The electric button placement makes it easy to dispense liquid unintentionally. We have the mechanical version and it does a better job than the electrical version. Tough spots are more easily cleaned with the mechanical. Further, it is not apparent that the liquid provided does a better job than just plain water. This is not to say this is a bad product. However the bells and whistles vice the older mechanical version add no valueom
customer_reviews.author: Hsas

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE quality!!! Do NOT purchase! Many other alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Both the outer box and inner box were BROKEN upon arrival. Swiffer is completely shattered into pieces and unusable. Deeply disappointed with how poorly this product was packaged and the quality of it. Beware, this is a NON-refundable item which is absolutely ridiculous given how cheaply made it is. Will never purchase from this distributor/seller ever again and will gladly purchase from the many other options there are on Amazon or in CVS that are just as good of prices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have a recurrent power problem...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in March 2017, used it maybe 5 times on my 20x20 studio. Today wouldn't spray even as I put new batteries. Very disappointing specially since I have 2 more in the house (older models) that have worked very well. Will try another brand, hopefully I will get more than 5 uses for the money.
customer_reviews.author: C.E.Roman

customer_reviews.title: I am 73 and enjoyed using this and purchased numerous refills
customer_reviews.text: I am 73 and enjoyed using this and purchased numerous refills,Suddenly out of the blue, it died,...Icouldnt restore it by changing batteries,so,with much sadness this product laster six months and is warranted for one year but i have not been able to get in touch with anybody to help me...;(...
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hadeler

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good so far. I bought a bunch of spray mops before this (because they had reusable pads mostly) but after they each quit spraying after a short time I finally broke down and got this. I also found and ordered washable pads for it. Since it uses batteries I don't have to worry about the sprayer breaking
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Not as good at picking up dirt as other mops
customer_reviews.text: You still cannot beat the good old fashioned, get on the floor and scrub it by hand to get it clean. The mop functions as designed, but does not get the floor nearly as clean as other mops or, as mentioned above, doing it by hand. I had one years ago and decided to get a new one (the other one broke shortly after getting it, but I decided to give it another try). This product gets a solid grade of "C" at best from me.
customer_reviews.author: HobbsGal

customer_reviews.title: Wet jet, batteries
customer_reviews.text: This item didn’t work well at first, and I find that some buyers have the same problem as me: The wet jet and motor couldn’t work, even if you change the batteries. But, finally I found where the problem is, as the photos show, the two shims sometimes aren’t at the right position, you need to make a little adjustment to ensure the electricity contact. Before I fixed up it, I almost wanted to return this item. So, please check the if the shims at the right position, or it won’t work though you change the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: XUZHEN

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't spray
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and there were a few that said their sprayer gave out or didn't work. But there were only a few bad reviews compared to so many good ones. I'm frustrated and disappointed. I'll be talking with customer service tomorrow and hope to get this worked out. As of now, I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit about 2 months ago and the batteries are already dead. It appears this unit does not have the ability to replace the batteries as there is no battery access door on this model. Buy beware.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I am sorry about, is that I didn't order this sooner. I have owned every type of mop ever made, even the old rag mops. So this guy does everything I could hope for. And no bending over a slop bucket wringing out an impossible mass of slush, rinsing 3-4 times to start over again. I am so happy with my new Swiffer Wetjet! Kudos to the engineers.
customer_reviews.author: StarSaver

customer_reviews.title: SWIFFER IS GREAT FOR CLEANING
customer_reviews.text: I like the swiffer mop. It is easy to use. We have tile in our long hall, a large space to our kitchen and dining room. I cleaned all this space plus our guest bathroom, laundry room and my bathroom. I was able to clean all this and was satisfied how clean it was afterward. I am 83 and in a wheelchair. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Alasca Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and just opened the package 31 days since purchase and it busted and now I can't return it. Very angry customer right here. Buy in the store so it's put together and you can make sure it works. This was a huge rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working! We even replaced the batteries and it’s still not working! It’s useless now. Very disappointed. Purchased it in March.
customer_reviews.author: Batya

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Great swiffer wet jet. My kids love running this, I finally found a way to get them to help clean. And they actually argue every weekend, who gets to mop!! Refills easy to buy got them off amazon also, (liquid floor cleaner and pad refills). Runs with batteries. I've had this for a few months now, and haven't had to change batteries yet. (Mop every weekend-2 entryways,kitchen,sunroom and dining room ).But might put rechargeable batteries in it next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: When working, it's just fine; otherwise, it's an awfully sensitive product
customer_reviews.text: It was time to change the batteries on my Swiffer Wet Jet, and after I made a complete replacement, the unit would not work! An engineering friend of mine inspected it and discovered that the tiny connecting plate had rusted and so the batteries couldn't make contact. Perhaps a manufacturing - or design - oversight? Anyway, I ordered a new one and Amazon Records indicate it was sent - but(!) - I haven't received it yet! Loooooong overdue!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanene

product_meta.title: Swiffer WetJet Starter Kit, Includes: 1 Power Mop, 5 Pads, Solution, Batteries
product_meta.description: Swiffer WetJet floor Spray Mop gives you a great clean on virtually any floor in your home. With a unique dual-nozzle sprayer, this all-in-one mopping system breaks up and dissolves tough messes for a powerful clean. Its cleaning solution loosens dirt and lifts it off The floor, pulling dirt and grime into the WetJet pad and locking it away for good. Reinforced handle - releases the perfect amount of solution with the touch of a finger. Sweep often - at least once a week. By sticking to this routine, you can clean your floors before dirt has time to collect on the surface.
feature_bullets: ABSORB + LOCK STRIP helps trap dirt & grime deep in pad so it doesn't get pushed around.
This floor mop is safe on all finished wood floors. Do not use on unfinished, oiled or waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles or carpeted floors because they may be water sensitive.
Designed to give you a great clean and act as a laminate floor cleaner and tile cleaner.
Starter kit includes 1 power floor spray mop, 3 extra power pad refills, 2 original mopping pad refills, (1) 500ML bottle of cleaning solution, 4 batteries

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
